name: Doug Jumpy
description:
The goal of the game is simple: click on the right or left of the screen to jump and climb the max number possible of plataforms to achieve the device record. WHATCH OUT: Don't let Doug stay too behind, because at every second the game speed increases! Play with your friends, make the best score and prove that you aren't the newbie among them :)

Can you beat the 615 score by Ands?

MUCH MORE TO COME!!!

Like our FB Page: https://www.facebook.com/dougjumpy?ref=aymt_homepage_panel

This game was idealized and created by three Computer Science students: Marcelo Gomes, Mariana Oliveira e Lucas Lascasas. When we realized that our project had become a funny game we decided to port it to Android. This is a initial version of the game to see how it is accepted by the players. We intend to launch a complete version with a lot more features!

I hope you enjoy the game!

Credits to:
- Marcelo Gomes, Mariana Oliveira e Lucas Lascasas for idealizating and creating the game.
- Marcelo Gomes for porting it to Android.
- Mariana Oliveira for the game art.

- axtoncrolley (http://www.freesound.org/people/axtoncrolley/) for providing his sounds at freesounds.
- Questiion (http://www.freesound.org/people/Questiion/) for providing his sounds at freesounds.
- Francisco for providing his sounds.
